Name: Fresca Nova
Ingredients: 45 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Top up with Brut champagne/sparkling wine
Instructions: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. Slowly TOP with sparkling wine.
Review: Cream, orange and champagne work surprisingly well.
History: Created by Jamie Terrell for Phillip Holzberg at Vinexpo 1999.
Nutrition: One serving of Fresca Nova contains 207 calories
